Booking2OGenericExceptionMessage: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
UnfinishedBooking_UnableToClearMsgs: We were unable to clear your recent searches. Please try again.
OmnicartExceptionMessage: There was an error when we tried to process your request. We're fixing the problem and should resolve it soon.
bugBountySessionExpiredMsg: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
MakeReservationDisclaimer: *Miles shown are the actual miles flown for this segment. Mileage accrued will vary depending on the terms and conditions of your frequent flyer program.  United MileagePlus mileage accrual is subject to the rules of the MileagePlus program.
IneligibleToEarnCreditMessage: This itinerary includes one or more flights that are ineligible to earn mileage or Premier qualifying credit.
OaIneligibleToEarnCreditMessage: Ineligible to accrue mileage or Premier qualifying credit.
umnrErrorMessage: Children under the age of 5 cannot travel unless they’re accompanied by a parent, legal guardian or someone who is at least 18 years old. Children ages 5-14 who are traveling unaccompanied must use our unaccompanied minor service, which cannot be booked with the United app. Please go to united.com to book.
PaymentTnCMessage: By clicking "Agree and purchase" you agree to all terms and conditions associated with this purchase
TPIPurchaseResposne-ConfirmationResponse: A confirmation email has been sent to
PremierAccessTermsAndConditionsList: paTandC1|This Premier Access offer is nonrefundable and non-transferable~paTandC2|Voluntary changes to your itinerary may forfeit your Premier Access purchase and  any associated fees.~paTandC3|In the event of a flight cancellation or involuntary schedule change, we will refund  the fees paid for the unused Premier Access product upon request.~paTandC4|Premier Access is offered only on flights operated by United and United Express.~paTandC5|This Premier Access offer is processed based on availability at time of purchase.~paTandC6|Premier Access does not guarantee wait time in airport check-in, boarding, or security lines. Premier Access does not exempt passengers from check-in time limits.~paTandC7|Premier Access benefits apply only to the customer who purchased Premier Access  unless purchased for all customers on a reservation. Each travel companion must purchase Premier Access in order to receive benefits.~paTandC8|“Premier Access” must be printed or displayed on your boarding pass in order to  receive benefits.~paTandC9|This offer is made at United's discretion and is subject to change or termination  at any time with or without notice to the customer.
PriorityBoardingTermsAndConditionsList: pbTandC1|Priority Boarding is offered only for flights operated by United and United Express®, and is subject to availability.~pbTandC2|Priority Boarding benefits only apply to flights for which they are purchased.~pbTandC3|Priority Boarding may occur after certain MileagePlus Premier Members have boarded.~pbTandC4|Customers who are traveling on a Basic Economy ticket cannot purchase Priority Boarding.~pbTandC5|If you make voluntary changes to an itinerary for which you’ve purchased Priority Boarding, your Priority Boarding benefits will automatically transfer to the flights on your updated itinerary that are operated by United or United Express, if available. However, if you cancel your itinerary entirely, your Priority Boarding purchase will not be refunded.~pbTandC6|For flight cancellations or involuntary schedule changes, we will transfer Priority Boarding to the new itinerary. If requested prior to flight to which Priority Boarding has been transferred, Priority Boarding for canceled flights will be refunded.~pbTandC7|Priority Boarding does not exempt passengers from check-in time limits.~pbTandC8|When available, you can purchase Priority Boarding for multiple people on your reservation. Priority Boarding must be purchased for each individual traveler in order for them to receive the benefits of Priority Boarding.~pbTandC9|“Priority Boarding” must be displayed on your boarding pass in order to receive benefits.~pbTandC10|This offer is made at United’s discretion and is subject to change or termination at any time with or without notice to the customer.
MP2015YQYRMessage: The award miles and Premier qualifying dollars displayed are calculated using the base fare and any applicable carrier-imposed surcharges for the itinerary. The initial calculation in the flight search results may be different than the final calculation shown on the Review Trip Itinerary page.
SubjectToGovernmentApprovalMessage: Subject to receipt of government operating authority
BookingDetail_ITAError_For_CSL_10047__Er: We are not able to find any available seats that meet your search criteria
OvernightConnectionMessage: Connecting flight departs the next day
DOTOnTimeMessagesBrazil: <br/><br/>*The cancellation percentage is calculated according to the total segments scheduled.<br/><br/><strong>Delayed:</strong> The delay percentage is determined by the scheduled arrival at the destination of each flight and calculated according to the total segments flown, disregarding canceled flights.<br/><br/>The delay and cancellation percentages represent past flights and therefore may change each month. The flight history for all regular public air transportation in Brazil is available on the National Civil Avaiation Agency's website.
DOTOnTimeMessages: On time: Percentage of arrivals within 15 minutes of scheduled arrival time|Late: Percentage of arrivals more than 30 minutes late|Canceled: Percentage canceled (shown if 5% or more of the flight's operations were canceled in the reporting period)|View on-time performance
DOTOnTimeNotAvailableMessage: There is no recent record of delay and cancellation percentage for this flight.
NoEnoughMilesForAwardBooking: Your account does not have enough miles to complete this transaction. Please search by price or go to the full buymiles.mileageplus.com site to purchase or transfer miles.
InhibitMessageV2: Flights must be booked no less than {0} minutes before the scheduled flight departure. Please complete your purchase soon to confirm your booking.
InhibitMessage: Flights must be booked no less than 60 minutes before the scheduled flight departure. Please complete your purchase soon to confirm your booking.
BOEINGDISCLAIMERMESSAGE: One of your selected flights is scheduled on a Boeing 737 MAX aircraft. To learn more about this aircraft, visit <a href="https://united.com/MAX">united.com/MAX</a>, or choose a different flight on the flight results page.
BEFareInversionMessage: For this trip, the price of standard Economy is the same or lower than the price of Basic Economy. We've updated your itinerary to standard Economy, which has fewer restrictions.
UpgradedFromElfText: Basic Economy cannot be combined with other fares, so we’ve updated your outbound flight(s) to standard Economy. This does not change the overall ticket price.<a href=\'https://www.united.com/ual/en/us/fly/booking/flight/travel-credits.html\' target=\'_blank\'>Learn More</a>
UpgradedFromElfTextWithHtml: <b>We’ve updated your selection</b><br/>Basic Economy cannot be combined with other fares, so we’ve updated your outbound flight(s) to standard Economy. This does not change the overall ticket price.
FarelockTextTop: United’s FareLock service lets you hold your fare and complete the purchase of your itinerary at a later time.
FarelockTextBottom: FareLock fees are nonrefundable and not applied toward the price of the ticket.
SSR_RefDataServiceFailure_ServiceAnimalM: animals cannot be booked online on this route
SSR_DefaultSpecialRequests: BSCT^Bassinet/cot^General^19|BLND^Blind^General^6|DEAF^Deaf^General^7|DPNA_1^Cognitive disability^General^20|DPNA_2^Other disability requiring assistance^General^21|WCBD^Dry cell^WheelchairReason^16|WCBW^Wet cell battery^WheelchairReason^17|WCHR^Cannot walk long distance^WheelchairType^4|WCLB^Lithium-ion battery^WheelchairReason^22|WCHS^Cannot ascend or descend stairs^WheelchairType^3|WCHC^Cannot walk^WheelchairType^14|WCMP^Manual power^WheelchairReason^18
SSR_DefaultMealCodes: HNML | GFML | KSML | MOML | VGML | AVML | CHML | VLML
SSR_MealRestrictionMessage: Please note that the special meal you’ve requested will only be available on your flight(s) from {0}.
SSRItinerarySpecialMealsNotAvailableMsg: We're unable to book a {0} meal on this route.
SSR_MarketMealRestrictionMessage: Please note that special meals will only be available on your flight(s) from {0}.
SSR_DPNA_Message: After booking your flight, you must call the Accessibility Desk at 1-800-228-2744 to complete your request for assistance.
TravelSpecialNeedInfoContent: We no longer accept emotional support animals due to new Department of Transportation regulations. <BR><BR> <a href = 'https://www.united.com/ual/en/US/fly/travel/special-needs/disabilities/assistance-animals.html'> Review our service animal policy  </a>
SSRItineraryServiceAnimalNotAvailableMsg: We're unable to book a service animal on this route.
CreditCardSelectedForContactlessTitle: Save credit card for inflight purchases
CreditCardSelectedForContactlessMessage: We'll save your credit card so when you fly, you'll be able to make onboard contactless purchases. You'll be unable to swipe a credit card in flight.
